resources.string:
You were not selected for the event.

You will remain in the waitlist so that you may have another chance to be chosen if a selected user declines their invitation.

If you wish to leave the waitlist, you may do so from the event page.

Congrats!!

You have selected to participate in the event.

Please go to the event page below to accept or decline you're invitation.
The organizer removed you from this event
